select date(create_date) as one_day,count(id) as num from sys_dispatch_list
create_date >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%Y%m%d')
and create_date <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY one_day ORDER BY one_day desc

select date(end_date) as one_day,count(id) as num from sys_dispatch_list
end_date >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%Y%m%d')
and end_date <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d')
and end_date is not null
GROUP BY one_day ORDER BY one_day desc
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status = 1
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status = 3

select CONCAT(cb.no,'-',cbu.no,'-',cbue.room_number) as room_name,uv.name,uv.tel,ur.name as invite_name,uv.expected_visit_date,uv.visit_date from user_visitors as uv,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,user_resident as ur where uv.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and uv.invite_people_id = ur.id
select type,status,content,create_date from sys_advice where is_delete = 1 and status = 3
select title,content,status,release_date from sys_announcement_management where status = 2
select count(*) from cpm_building
select count(*) from cpm_building_unit_estate where is_delete = 1
select count(*) from cpm_building_unit_estate where is_delete = 1 and status in (1,5)
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space where status = 1
select count(*) from cpm_parking_space where status = 2
select count(distinct code) from user_car
select count(*) from user_resident where type = 1
select count(*) from user_resident where type = 3
select count(sdp.id) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and YEAR(sdp.begin_date) = YEAR(#{date}) and sctd.marker = 1
select sum(total_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and YEAR(sdp.begin_date) = YEAR(#{date}) and sctd.marker = 1
select count(sdp.id) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 3
select sum(paid_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 3
select count(sdp.id) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 1
select sum(payment_price) from sys_daily_payment as sdp,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.charges_template_detail_id = sctd.id and sctd.marker = 1 and sdp.status = 1

select date(last_date) as createDate,count(DISTINCT resident_id) as daily_activity_num from sys_resident_request_log
and last_date >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%Y%m%d')
and last_date <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY createDate ORDER BY createDate desc
select DISTINCT su.id,su.actual_name,su.tel from sys_inspection_execute as sie,sys_inspection_plan as sip,sys_user as su where sie.inspection_plan_id = sip.id and sip.inspector = su.id

select sie.id,sip.name,sie.begin_date,sie.end_date,sie.actual_begin_date,sie.actual_end_date from sys_inspection_execute as sie,sys_inspection_plan as sip where sie.inspection_plan_id = sip.id and DATE(sie.begin_date) = DATE(#{date}) order by sie.begin_date

select sie.id,sip.name,sie.begin_date,sie.end_date,sie.actual_begin_date,sie.actual_end_date from sys_inspection_execute as sie,sys_inspection_plan as sip where sie.inspection_plan_id = sip.id and DATE(sie.begin_date) = DATE(#{date}) order by sie.begin_date
select id,code,name,complete_date,longitude,latitude from sys_inspection_execute_point where execute_id = #{executeId}
select longitude,latitude,create_date from sys_inspection_execute_map where execute_id = #{executeId}

select sie.id,sip.name,su.actual_name as inspector,sie.begin_date,sie.end_date,sie.actual_begin_date,sie.actual_end_date from sys_inspection_execute as sie,sys_inspection_plan as sip,sys_user as su where sie.inspection_plan_id = sip.id and sip.inspector = su.id

select sdl.id,sdl.code, (case sdl.status < 4 when true then 1 else 2 end) as status, (case sdl.end_date is null when true then srr.create_date else sdl.end_date end) as date_time from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl where sdl.id = srr.dispatch_list_id
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status < 4
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status >= 4
select count(*) from sys_report_repair where type = 1
select count(*) from sys_report_repair where type = 2
select count(*) from sys_article_detail
select count(*) from sys_article_borrow as sab,sys_article_detail as sad where sab.article_detail_id = sad.id and sab.borrow_status in (1,3)
select count(*) from sys_article_detail where status = 2
select count(*) from sys_article_detail where status = 3
